data.description:
**Security Control** is a 1-4 player Party-Horror Game. You have fallen asleep on your first day of work and now have to evade the security officer! Hide, run, complete objectives, steal money and escape before you get caught and fired!

In a unique twist you can take the role of the Security Guard and chase your friends around the workplace, make sure to catch them all!

**TRAVERSE EVER-CHANGING WORKPLACES**  
Get ready to explore 10 different levels with 5 different workplaces, and 30 unique objectives. Including malls, offices, schools, a cruise ship and a haunted mansion. With randomly generated levels each play is uniquely different! The possibilities are endless!

{989051122321309}

# GAMEPLAY  
**The Cellphone**  
Your essential in-game companion: the Cellphone. Packed with versatile apps, it's your go-to for navigating the corporate maze. Stay connected with your team, hack security cameras, or boost your visibility with night vision.
{2250752908597077}

**Play With Friends**  
Embark on your escape solo or with a team to outwit the vigilant security guard. Utilize every resource available to make your way out of the corporate maze before you're caught. Can you and your team work together and make your grand escape, or will you assume the role of the relentless security guard to thwart their every move?
{965596411927278}

**Complete Texts**  
While you are trying to escape your workplace your significant other is texting you to complete objectives before coming home! Make sure to complete all the texts before you come home, or you shouldn't come back at all!
{398946759771855}

changelog.change_log: Added Banana Peel, Improved level creation on multiplayer (less desyncs), Adjusted Security Difficulty, Other bug fixes.
